recipe.name: Bashamel Pasta
recipe.description: A creamy pasta dish with homemade Bachamel sauce.
recipe.ingredients:
250g pasta

2 cups milk

4 tbsp butter

4 tbsp all-purpose flour

Salt and pepper to taste
recipe.steps:
Cook pasta according to package instructions.

In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat.

Stir in flour and cook for 2-3 minutes until golden brown.

Gradually whisk in milk, stirring constantly until the sauce thickens.

Season with salt and pepper.

Combine the cooked pasta with the Béchamel sauce.

Pour into a baking dish and top with cheddar cheese.

Bake at 350°F for 20 minutes.

Serve hot and enjoy!
